## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem or Use Case
What problem does this solve? What is your use case?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Example Usage
If applicable, show how you would use this feature:

```python
# Example code or command
q2netcdf --new-feature input.q output.nc
```

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

## Impact
- [ ] This would affect performance
- [ ] This requires breaking changes to the API
- [ ] This affects backward compatibility
- [ ] This requires new dependencies

## Willingness to Contribute
- [ ] I would be willing to implement this feature
- [ ] I can help test this feature
- [ ] I can provide sample data for testing
